scripts.deploy:netlify: NITRO_PRESET=netlify nuxi build && npx netlify deploy
scripts.deploy:netlify-edge: NITRO_PRESET=netlify-edge nuxi build && npx netlify deploy --prod
scripts.deploy:cloudflare-workers: NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare nuxi build && npx wrangler publish --config wrangler-workers.toml
scripts.deploy:cloudflare-pages: NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare-pages nuxi build && npx wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name og-image-pages-demo
